source_quote: the highest probability Long opportunities happen in the Discount side of the Dealing Range

signature.condition: IF price is in the Discount side of the Dealing Range
signature.action: THEN expect a Buy Program to occur (high probability Long opportunities)
signature.drawer_basis: ICT explicitly defines premium/discount zones as condition filters

source_quote: the highest probability short positions happen in the Premium side of the Dealing Range

signature.condition: IF price is in the Premium side of the Dealing Range
signature.action: THEN expect a Sell Program to occur (high probability Short opportunities)
signature.drawer_basis: ICT explicitly defines premium/discount zones as condition filters

source_quote: once price reaches the Equilibrium point... you will just have to admit to yourself that you have no idea where the market is going to go from here

signature.condition: IF price reaches the Equilibrium point
signature.action: THEN expect price to go into range/consolidation (Equilibrium Hurdles)
signature.drawer_basis: ICT explicitly teaches equilibrium as a key price level

source_timestamp: Chart with 'Price breaks the structure' annotation
source_quote: Price breaks the structure - Trend Following trade

signature.condition: IF price breaks the structure (above dealing range)
signature.action: THEN consider this a Trend Following trade signal
signature.drawer_basis: Structure breaks are core ICT market structure concepts

source_timestamp: Chart with 'Looking for Long entries' annotation
source_quote: Strong Liquidity Grab... Looking for Long entries

signature.condition: IF price shows a Strong Liquidity Grab downward move into Discount zone
signature.drawer_basis: ICT teaches liquidity grabs as entry triggers
